prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (serious Asian man:1.1), intense focused gaze, spiky black hair, silver-rimmed glasses, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (subtle skin imperfections:1.1), (realistic lens refraction on glasses:1.2), individual hair strands, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching heavy fabric weave on attire:1.2), cinematic lighting, film grain, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, smooth skin, airbrushed, low quality, (no glasses:1.5), deformed frame, messy hair, long hair, child
